content.raw:
Yes. The issue is that I haven't been able to give the `/wamv` namespace to the WAM-V sensors and thrusters when spawning using `gz`. Using `roslaunch vrx_gazebo dock.launch` works as expected with the `/wamv` namespace. However, using `roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch world:=<path to dock world> non_competition_mode:=false`, this spawns using `gz` and I was unable to get put it under that namespace.

I have tried: 

1. Adding `ns="wamv"` to the node that calls spawn\_wamv.bash
2. Adding `<group ns="wamv">...</group>` around the node
3. Looking for parameters to set the namespace from `gz model`, to no success \(eg. -n does not work\)

Is this an issue? Is there a better way to do this? Thanks
